episodes.title: 304 Victims. South Korea Cult? Sewol Ferry Disaster  #sewol #southkorea
episodes.description:
On April 16,  2014, 304 lives lost. A nation in mourning. Was the Sewol ferry disaster really just an accident?
As details emerge — a vanished president, cult connections, and eerie coincidences — a darker theory refuses to fade:
Was this tragedy a carefully planned sacrifice?
11 years later, South Korea is still searching for answers.
And the truth may be more terrifying than anyone imagined.
